title: Fruity and chewy flapjacks
ingredients: ['7 tablespoons seeds (use a mix of sesame, sunflower, flax, pumpkin, etc.)', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '6 tablespoons oil (I use olive oil but you can use a more neutral oil)', '160g rolled oats', '280g golden syrup', 'pinch salt', '175g mixed dried fruit']
